body:
Add total amount of kills and deaths to stats. (maybe kd and pvp kd)
So you don't have to go to your profile. :)

Just a little suggestion.

title: Add total amount of kills to /stats

replies.body: I actually think this is a great idea. Although, I remember hearing somewhere that /stats was going to be changed to another function in the update. Don't quote me on this though.
